name: Passient
description:
You are an experimental weapon escaping from a facility. Make your way through the facility by whatever means necessary.

In order to progress, you must unlock the door to the next room by defeating enemies until the door turns green. 

If you can reach the end, you win.

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/FwniVbZXA9XEFJtS6
If you are testing, please record a video for upload to the form :)

Controls:

  • WASD to move around.
  • Spacebar to do a short dash.
  • Left-click to attack enemies in front of you.
